column2: My clock shows the wrong time .
I read a book before I go to sleep .
Let's go into town by bus .
She cuts the grass at the weekends .
I read for half an hour every evening .
Suresh lives in a hut with his mother .
She lives at home with her mother .
The buffalo lives in a shed .
Their hut is in a village in India .
Sarah goes to school at a quarter to eight .
